hits.definition:
石

[shí] (= 石头 shítou) stone, rock

[dàn] unit of grain

{Compare with 右 yòu right}

弟

[dì] (= 弟弟 dìdi) younger brother

[tì] (= 悌)

谁 (F 誰)

[shuí] who?

[shéi] who?

校

[xiào] (= 学校 xuéxiào) school

[jiào] (= 校对 jiàoduì, 校正 jiàozhèng) proofread

读 (F 讀)

[dú] read

[dòu] pause in reading

观 (F 觀)

[guān] view, contemplation

[guàn] 道观 Dàoguàn Daoist temple

究

[jiū] 研究 yánjiū study, research; 究竟 jiūjìng after all

包

[bāo] bag, wrap

造

[zào] (= 制造 zhìzào) manufacture, (= 创造 chuàngzào) create

落

[luò] fall

[là] be missing

[lào] 落色 làoshǎi fade (in colour)

[luō] 空落落 kōngluōluō absolutely nothing left, open/spacious and desolate

视 (F 視)

[shì] look; 电视 diànshì television

济 (F 濟)

[jì] 经济 jīngjì economy; 救济 jiùjì help disaster victims

[jǐ] 济济 jǐjǐ multitudinous, numerous, magnificent
